mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_apply_audition_notification (member_profile_id, audition_application_id, message, create_date) SELECT p.member_profile_id, aa.id, #{content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM tbl_audition_application aa JOIN tbl_audition a ON aa.audition_id = a.id JOIN tbl_post p ON a.id = p.id WHERE aa.id = #{auditionApplicationId}
